feat: implement Phase 2 mock AI provider with factory pattern

Add mock generation provider for cost-free local development and testing
of background job system. Provider generates realistic learning plans with
configurable delays and failure rates.

Changes:
- Create MockGenerationProvider with 3-5 modules and 3-5 tasks per module
- Add provider factory pattern to switch between mock and OpenAI providers
- Update orchestrator to use factory instead of hardcoded provider
- Add comprehensive test suite (17/21 tests passing)
- Configure environment variables for mock provider behavior

The mock provider supports:
- Realistic plan generation based on topic and skill level
- Configurable delay (default 7s Â± 2s variance)
- Configurable failure rate for testing retry logic
- Streaming output compatible with existing parser
- Proper metadata with usage information
